blogPost.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
blogPost.body: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
blogPost.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS
blogPost.author: Alex

localize.description: Invoice是一个基于文档的发票制作应用程序，仅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平台上可用。您的所有发票文件和首选项都存储在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同设备无缝工作，而无需创建用于同步的帐户。
localize.tagline: 适用于iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基于文档的发票生成器应用程序

localize.description: Invoice是一個基於文檔的發票製作應用程序，僅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平臺上可用。您的所有發票文件和首選項都存儲在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同設備無縫工作，而無需創建用於同步的帳戶。
localize.tagline: 適用於iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基於文檔的發票生成器應用程序

previous.excerpt: At BAM, we created a set of most-used icons in 3D. Now we'd like to put our illustrations into your dispositions, you can use them for any use, our only condition is that you can't resell them as your creation and you keep our name in your credit :) Enjoy!
previous.title: BAM Free 3D Illustration Kit - More than 30 high quality 3D icons, free to use.

localize.description: 在BAM，我们创建了一套3D中最常用的图标。现在，我们想把我们的插图放到您的手中，您可以将它们用于任何用途，我们唯一的条件是您不能将它们作为您的作品转售，并且您要将我们的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多个高质量的3D图标，免费使用。

localize.description: 在BAM，我們創建了一套3D中最常用的圖標。現在，我們想把我們的插圖放到您的手中，您可以將它們用於任何用途，我們唯一的條件是您不能將它們作爲您的作品轉售，並且您要將我們的名字保留在您的信用中 :) 。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 30多個高質量的3D圖標，免費使用。
